title: DPM chairs meeting to ensure stability of fertilizer pricing
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Monday chaired a meeting of cabinet committee to ensure stability of fertilizer pricing.
Minister for Industries Rana Tanveer Hussain and senior government officials participated in the meeting.
The participants were briefed on discussions between the government, gas suppliers and the fertilizer industry. The availability of gas for fertilizer industry was also examined and found to be satisfactory.
The Deputy Prime Minister directed maintaining an uninterrupted gas supply to the fertilizer industry throughout Rabi cropping season to ensure stable production and stocks.
